sentences.en: Barricade - Hunter type. Cop car likes to get to things first.
sentences.cn: 猎人型. 变形为警车,喜欢抢前一步获得目标.

sentences.en: Barricade : Cop car; Hunter type; likes to get things first.
sentences.cn: 路障: 警车; 猎人型; 喜欢抢先一步获得目标.

sentences.en: Beyond the barricade Is there a world you to see?
sentences.cn: 透过千山万阻,你是否一直渴望着见到这个美丽的世界?

sentences.en: During the riots, some of the prisoners barricaded their cells.
sentences.cn: 暴动期间，有些囚犯把牢房堵了起来。

sentences.en: I thought we were going to barricade.
sentences.cn: 我倒觉得我们该搞些东西把门堵上.

sentences.en: It is difficult to break through a steel barricade.
It was impossible to break through her barricade of reticence.
sentences.cn: 要打破她沉默的壁垒简直是不可能的.

sentences.en: Please stand behind the police barricade.
Please step behind the police barricade.
The fans were kept back behind barricades.
sentences.cn: 歌迷们被拦在路障后面。

sentences.en: The invention also discloses an administration method for the two - level battlements type cantilevered L - shaped barricade.
sentences.cn: 本发明还公开了这种二级垛式悬臂式L型挡墙的实施方法.

sentences.en: The invention discloses a two - level battlements type cantilevered L - shaped barricade and a construction method thereof.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了一种二级垛式悬臂式L型挡墙及其实施方法.

sentences.en: The man and boy then start to pile up a barricade.
sentences.cn: 这时他和孩子开始堆放防护垛.

sentences.en: The soldiers make a barricade across the road.
They could barricade parliament again, as they did last month, and generate a fresh stalemate.
sentences.cn: 他们可以在次封锁国会, 就像他们在上个月做的那样, 并导致新的僵局.
他们破袭了那处防御工事.

sentences.en: When welding be sure to wear hood and barricade the working area.
sentences.cn: 烧焊时必须戴上面罩并将工作区域围起来.

phrases.tran_cn: 强烈抗议政府（或其他机构）

trans.tran_en: a temporary wall or fence across a road, door etc that prevents people from going through
to build a barricade to prevent someone or something from getting in

trans.tran_cn: 设路障于，以障碍物阻塞，封锁，阻挡
trans.tran_en: to build a barricade to prevent someone or something from getting in
